message: All metadata fields for the indicator 2-3-2, translated into en
data: Goal 2. End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture2.3 By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous people, family farmers, pastoralists and fishermen, including by ensuring equal access to land, other productive resources and factors of production, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-agricultural employment2.3.2. Number of functional umbrella organizations in the tea, cotton, palm, rice, milk, etc. sectors.Not availableThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level
